creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
When Tomcat is installed on (f.e.) C: and want to change the server.xml with the docbase path to "W:\Temporary\A&P Supermarkt\Java\Sources"

and now you will start the tomcat server with startup.bat, it initiate and then stops working immediatly.

This is a user error.  Since server.xml is XML, the '&' in "A&P" must be
escaped.  Changing the docBase to:

    "W:\Temporary\A&P Supermarkt\Java\Sources"

should work.  A simple test with Tomcat 3.1 and 3.2 confirms this.
creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
